name: Whiscash

passive.name: Submerge
passive.effect: While this Pokemon is on the Bench, it is immune to all effects of attacks.

attacks.name: Splash
attacks.effect: Put a damage counter on 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.effect: Put 2 damage counters on all Benched Pokemon.

flavor: These invasive predators can take over whole river systems.
